headline: Production Editor/Writer at U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE)
summary:
PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE:
- Led Presidential administrative support operations for the Department of Defense.
- Organizational realignment planning and execution. 
- Training plan development. 
- Problem resolution.
- Process improvement.
- Personnel management.
- Operations inspection and evaluation.
- Government contract Site Lead.
- Accomplished writer and editor.
- Polished public speaking and briefing skills.

defaultPosition.description: Lead editor ensuring all products are reviewed, edited, and fully prepared for dissemination in accordance with established guidelines.  Prepares a variety of production reports and analyses for senior leaders.  Maintains the organization's style guide and Production's operating procedures.  Provides editorial training to Headquarters and field units.  Provides advice and guidance on Production to senior leadership.
defaultPosition.title: Production Editor/Writer

positions.description: Lead editor ensuring all products are reviewed, edited, and fully prepared for dissemination in accordance with established guidelines.  Prepares a variety of production reports and analyses for senior leaders.  Maintains the organization's style guide and Production's operating procedures.  Provides editorial training to Headquarters and field units.  Provides advice and guidance on Production to senior leadership.
positions.title: Production Editor/Writer

positions.description: Lead company representative to a government agency.  Provides advice and guidance to 10 assigned company personnel.  Works with the customer to define requirements, goals and tasks.  Responsible for reviewing and revising communications products and other documentation prepared by members of the organization for dispersal throughout the agency. Works with the primary author to edit/rewrite products for consistent office messaging, organization, grammar, style, accuracy, and consistency of technical data. Advises management and analysts with technical knowledge of steps required to produce publications and various types of presentation media.
positions.title: Senior Technical Editor & Site Lead

positions.description: Advisor to the Deputy Assistant to the President on the management, training, morale, and welfare of 2,400 personnel.  Supervises the daily operations of the Human Resources, Logistics, and Administrative programs.  Conducts extensive research and management studies in support of the Presidential mission.  Interprets and provides guidance on regulations, policies, and procedures to senior leadership, employees, and the senior enlisted advisors for 7 operational units and 6 directorates.  Reviews, edits, and finalizes all communications destined to the President and his Administration.
positions.title: Deputy Director for Administration & Senior Enlisted Advisor

positions.description: Advisor to the group commander and responsible for the management of daily operations of 7 squadrons and divisions encompassing over 1,400 personnel.  Conducted complex management studies, analyzed findings, and made recommendations to senior leadership to greatly improve the efficiency and effectiveness of unit programs.  Researched, analyzed, wrote, reviewed, and evaluated all types or reports, evaluations, and correspondence.
positions.title: Mission Support Group Superintendent

positions.description: Advised the Commander on all issues related to proper personnel utilization, leadership quality, management and supervisory training, morale and quality of life for a 129-person Air Intelligence Agency squadron.  Ensured organizational policies were understood; problems and concerns resolved; and quality recommendations were provided.  Researched, analyzed, wrote, reviewed, and evaluated all types or reports & correspondence.
positions.title: Computer Systems Squadron Superintendent
